name: safety-explorer-suite
description: The Safety Explorer Suite provides a framework for rendering a set of charts related to Clinical Trial Safety Monitoring.
author: Rho, Inc.

scripts.build: npm audit fix && npm run bundle && npm run format
scripts.format: npm run format-src && npm run format-bundle
scripts.test-page: start chrome ./test-page/index.html && start firefox ./test-page/index.html && start iexplore file://%CD%/test-page/index.html
